short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension help you quickly use Pullsh service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have wondered how to quickly send a message from your computer to a phone.

Pullsh is a tool to help you create and share text with short id between devices. 

It is available on Android, https://pullsh.me, and Chrome Extension.

Through them, you can create a memo, and store it online. (We call it a push)
You will get an unique id for that memo.

With the memo id, you can use Pullsh tools on any platform, to read that memo. (We call it a pull)

You can check the history of pull and push made in this extension.

Enjoy!!
